Thanks a lot.
Excellent video... and lousy audio.
I'm not saying badly done, more like a bad choice. Audio bit rate to low.
You're one of the most talented uploaders, why waste it with an audio like this?

Haven't seen the download yet but, in a way, I agree with micmac33's comment regarding the audio. Often hardly audible. But on the other hand,  YIFY includes *srt files which overcomes most of these problems (for me anyway). Keep up the good work YIFY... you're a LEGEND!
Audio is bit at the lacking side (:
